name: 真乃
text:
ほわぁ……とってもいいお天気だね
鳩さんたちも気持ちいいかな？
trans:
Ahh... the weather is so nice today,
The pigeons think so as well, right?

name: 真乃
text:
……ふふ
気持ちよさそうだね
trans:
Hehe...
It feels so inviting.

name: 灯織
text: ……真乃？
trans: ...Mano?

name: 真乃
text: あっ、灯織ちゃん……
trans: Ah, Hiori...

name: 灯織
text: 本当に公園にいるんだ？
trans: You really did come to the park.

name: 真乃
text:
うん……
何かあったのかな……？
trans:
Yes...
Is something wrong about that?

name: 灯織
text:
真乃はここにいるって、
プロデューサーから聞いて
trans:
I heard it from the Producer,
That you went here.

name: 灯織
text:
半信半疑で来てみたんだけど……
本当にいたから
trans:
I thought about coming here,
to check if you were truly here.

name: 真乃
text:
そうだったんだね、
私、灯織ちゃんに何か迷惑かけちゃったのかと思った……
trans:
Oh so that's what it is,
I just thought that I made you upset...

name: 灯織
text:
どうして？
何か心当たりでもあるの
trans:
Why so? Did I do something
to make you think that?

name: 真乃
text:
え？
ううん、そういうわけじゃ……
trans:
Huh? 
No-no, nothing like that!

name: 灯織
text: だったらビクビクするのはおかしいと思う
trans: I don't think you should say something so strange suddenly.

name: 真乃
text:
そ、そうだね……
ほわわ……
trans:
I-I guess so..
You're right...

name: 灯織
text:
……で、
ここで何してたの？
trans:
...Well,
What are you doing here?

name: 灯織
text:
もうすぐレッスン始まるけど
事務所にいないし
trans:
Our lesson starts soon
and you weren't at the office.

name: 真乃
text:
あ、そっか！
ごめんなさい、ちゃんと事務所にいないとだよね
trans:
Ah, you're right!
I'm sorry I didn't come to the office.

name: 真乃
text: すぐに戻るから──
trans: I'll be going now──

name: 灯織
text: そうじゃなくて……
trans: That's not all of it...

name: 灯織
text:
真乃がなんで公園にいるのか、
純粋に質問してるだけ
trans:
Mano, why are you alone at the park?
I'm asking a question for you to answer.

name: 真乃
text:
ほわっ、あ……えっと、
お天気がよかったからだよ
trans:
Well... It's becauce...
I love the atmosphere here.

name: 真乃
text:
私ね、公園が好きなの
鳩さんたちとお話するのも好きなんだ
trans:
You see, I love being at the park
and I love talking with the pigeons too.

name: 真乃
text: だからよく、ここに来るんだよ
trans: That's the reason why I came here!

name: 灯織
text: そう、なんだ……
trans: Oh, so that's what it is.

name: 真乃
text: あの……私、変なこと言った……かな？
trans: Did... did I say something weird again?

name: 灯織
text: ごめん、そうじゃなくて
trans: No, you didnt. I'm sorry about that,

name: 灯織
text:
ただ、好きって言い切るから
ちょっと驚いちゃって
trans:
I was just surprised by
how much you cared about this park.

name: 真乃
text: そう……かな？
trans: Oh... is that so?

name: 灯織
text: 好きってはっきり言えるの、すごいと思って
trans: I was impressed how you confidently said you "liked" this park.

name: 真乃
text: ほわ……そうなのかな……？
trans: Really... is that so?

name: 灯織
text: 他にも好きなものとかあったりするの？
trans: What are the other things you like to do as well?

name: 真乃
text:
自然がいっぱいのところに、
お出かけするのも好きだよ
trans:
I like going out, 
and finding many places near nature too.

name: 真乃
text:
例えば、
お弁当を持ってピクニックとか……
trans:
And also,
I like bringing food for picnics.

name: 灯織
text: ……とか？
trans: ...And?

name: 真乃
text:
えっと……灯織ちゃん、あのね
……その、急にお願いして驚くと思うんだけど
trans:
Well... I know this may seem like a sudden request
for you, but...

name: 真乃
text:
……こっ、今度、
一緒にピクニックに行って……欲しいな？
trans:
...Would you like to go out
on a picnic with me?

name: 灯織
text: 真乃とふたりで？
trans: Just us?

name: 真乃
text: あ、でも……迷惑だったら別に……？
trans: Ah, but if that causes much trouble...

name: 灯織
text:
……迷惑なんて言ってないよ
いいよ、一緒に行こう
trans:
...I didn't say it was bad, but that's okay.
We can go together.

name: 真乃
text:
ほわっ
本当にいいの？
trans:
Really?
Is it really okay?

name: 灯織
text: うん、いいよ
trans: Yes, It's fine.

name: 真乃
text:
じゃあ、
私お弁当作るから、一緒に食べようねっ
trans:
Then,
I'll make our lunch and we can eat together.
